description: It is a centre for providing rehabilitation support. The services of Rehabilitation Professionals such as Prosthetist & Orthotist (P&O), Occupational Therapists, Audiologists, Physiotherapists etc. are made available in this centre.

procedures.step_description: For details, please visit department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul

title: District Disability Rehabilitation Centre

description: Provides financial assistance to old aged persons, destitute, and widows with no source of income.  The pension amount is Rs. 1500/- per month.

procedures.step_description: Visit the department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul for details.

title: Manipur Old Age Pension Scheme

criteria.description: No income or source of income, either of their own or anyone else who is legally liable to support him or her.
If both husband and wife are destitute, each one of them shall be eligible for pension.
Widows who don't have any source of income including income from property owned by her or who has an earning brother.

description: Cash benefit of Rs.5000/- for the first living child in three instalments

procedures.step_description: For details, please visit department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul

title: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)

description: Apart from rehabilitation services, short term and long term courses will be conducted for Manpower development in the field of rehabilitation

procedures.step_description: For details, please visit department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul

title: Composite Regional Centre (CRC)

description: • To supplement to the school system by providing an environment conducive to creative thinking and activity to the children. • To offer guidance for imbibing the quality of leadership and creativity among through special training courses, workshops, demonstration etc

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Children between the age group of 6-16 years.

title: Bal Bhavan

description: skill development, employment, digital literacy, health and nutrition”.

procedures.step_description: For details, please visit department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul

title: Mahila Shakti Kendra

description: (i) To provide day care facilities for children ( 6 months to 6 years ) of working mother in the community. (ii) To improve nutrition and health status of children (iii) To promote physical, cognitive , social and emotional development (iv) To educate and empower parents (caregiver for better child care).

procedures.step_description: Visit the department of Social Welfare, Ukhrul for details.

title: Rajiv Gandhi National Creche Schemes

description: • creating a system to protect children based on the cardinal principles of “protection of child rights” and “best interest of the child”, • improvements in the well being of children in difficult circumstances • Reduction of vulnerabilities to situations and actions that lead to abuse, neglect, exploitation, abandonment and separation of children from their families.

beneficiaries.beneficiary_type: Children in need of care and protection (CNCP)
Homeless or without minimal means of subsistence
Neglected or in a reasonable likelihood of being harmed
Physically / mentally challenged or terminally ill
Victim of armed conflict, civil commotion or natural calamity etc
alleged to have committed an offence

title: Child Protection Services(CPS), Scheme “MISSION VATSALYA”

description: The National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP) provides financial assistance to vulnerable groups including the elderly, widows, disabled individuals, and bereaved households.  It comprises four sub-schemes: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS), Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS), Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme (IGNDPS), and National Family Benefit Scheme (NFBS).

procedures.step_description: Visit the department of Social Welfare, DC Complex, Ukhrul for more details.

title: National Social Assistance Programme(NSAP)

description: Provides financial assistance of Rs. 300 per month.

procedures.step_description: Apply at District Social Welfare Office

title: Indira Gandhi National Disable Pension Scheme (IGNDPS)

procedures.step_description: Eligible persons may visit the Office of the Ukhrul District Disable Organization Head Office, Litan, Ukhrul.

description: The scheme is under NSAP and provides a scale of benefit @ Rs 300/- per month to the widow persons living below poverty line within the age of 40-59 years

procedures.step_description: Visit the District Social Welfare Office, Ukhrul for further details

title: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme (IGNWPS)

criteria.description: Widow persons living below poverty line within the age of 40-59 years

description: The scale of benefit is Rs. 200/- per months, however under IGNOAPS-Rs. 200- per month in the age group of 60 to 79 years and Rs. 500/- per month for the persons in the age group of 80 years and above.

procedures.step_description: The eligible applicants may visit the District Social Welfare Office, Ukhrul

title: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme (IGNOAPS)
funding_pattern: Rs. 200/- per month in the age group of 60 to 79 years and Rs. 500/- per month for the persons in the age group of 80 years and above.

criteria.description: The age of the applicant shall be a minimum of 60 years
